title: Improve tests to cover more configurations
body_html: Many of our tests do not test enough combinations of configurations. For example, in double backward tests, lacking cases with some inputs not requiring gradients helped this nasty bug escaping our detection: #4812. We should generally improve tests to cover more configurations.
body_text: Many of our tests do not test enough combinations of configurations. For example, in double backward tests, lacking cases with some inputs not requiring gradients helped this nasty bug escaping our detection: #4812. We should generally improve tests to cover more configurations.
body: Many of our tests do not test enough combinations of configurations. For example, in double backward tests, lacking cases with some inputs not requiring gradients helped this nasty bug escaping our detection: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/4812. We should generally improve tests to cover more configurations.
